title: Lower async functions to coroutine state machines with stable call ABI across optimization modes

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: async entry lowers to coroutine state machine entry and uses continuation-based call ABI
values live across await suspension points are materialized in a coroutine frame
await lowering emits suspend and resume edges without changing source-level async signature

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized lowering preserves coroutine-based async calling convention from -O0
optimization may simplify state transitions but cannot remove required suspend and resume ABI edges
frame-carried values needed after await remain ABI-visible to coroutine resume path

abi_field_stability.required_shape: importers and exporters agree on continuation-based coroutine call ABI for async declarations
await points lower to stable suspension and resumption ABI edges under all optimization modes
